items.content_html: AuthHub is a lightweight and robust open-source authorization system designed for simplicity and security. Built on the power of MySQL for data storage and ExpressJS for seamless web application integration, it provides a straightforward solution for managing user access within your projects.

items.content_html: A versatile and lightweight utility to format file sizes, providing both human-readable and customizable representations. This library supports various size units, including bits, bytes, kilobytes (KB), kibibytes (KiB), megabytes (MB), mebibytes (MiB), and beyond. Users can choose between binary and decimal units for flexibility.
items.title: ishan-18/filesizeformatter: A versatile and lightweight utility to format file sizes, providing both human-readable and customizable representations. This library supports various size units, including bits, bytes, kilobytes (KB), kibibytes (KiB), megabytes (MB), mebibytes (MiB), and beyond. Users can choose between binary and decimal units for flexibility.
